long_description: Sporting iconic Sanuk style, the women's Sanuk Sporty Chill shoes also keep your feet warm and cozy with faux shearling linings. Cotton canvas uppers have seams that are meant to fray, giving them that well-worn look. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move and spread for natural shock absorption. Plush polyester shearling linings keep the chill at bay, offering insulating and moisture-wicking performance. AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) treatment deters odors. EVA midsoles and outsoles on the Sanuk Shorty Chill shoes offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on; soles are rubberized EVA for durability. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: Sporting iconic Sanuk style, the women's Sanuk Sporty Chill shoes also keep your feet warm and cozy with faux shearling linings.
